timeline.message: Add initial impl of add registry entry

timeline.bodyText: is there an issue in doing a getEndpointRegistryByUUID instead of introducing a new SQL query to check the existance?
timeline.author: fazlan-nazeem

replies.bodyText: This query is to check whether the given entry name already exists.
replies.author: vithu30

replies.bodyText: getEndpointRegistryByUUID method cannot be used for this purpose I think. Here, the existence of the entry is checked using its' name not using UUID. Validating the unique constraint of (ENTRY_NAME, REG_ID).
replies.author: ChamodDamitha

timeline.author: fazlan-nazeem

replies.bodyText:
It is added only here, the SQL query does not have ENDPOINT_DEFINITION. We are not retrieving the definitionFile in the SQL query - [1]. Do we need to return the definition file with the method getRegistryEntryByUUID?
[1] https://github.com/wso2/carbon-apimgt/blob/master/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.impl/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/impl/dao/constants/SQLConstants.java#L1417
replies.author: vithu30

timeline.bodyText: do we store the content type in the db? do we need it for any purpose?
timeline.author: fazlan-nazeem

replies.bodyText: No, it is not stored. Up to now, we haven't use the content-type field. Added ResourcFile instead of InputStream for definition file, in case it is needed in the future
replies.author: vithu30

replies.bodyText: does this content-type mean xml, json, yaml etc?
replies.author: fazlan-nazeem
